hibernate-mapping.query: from Article where cast(type as string) = ? Order by uptime desc
from Article as a where cast(a.pass as string) like ? and a.time like ? and a.person.account like ? and a.title like ? and cast(a.type as string) = ? Order by a.uptime desc
from Article as a where a.column_id like ? and cast(a.pass as string) like ? and a.time like ? and a.title like ? and cast(a.type as string) = ? Order by a.uptime desc
select count(*) from Article as a where column_id like ? and time like ? and cast(pass as string) like ?
from Person as p where cast(p.role.role_code as string) = ?
from Person as p where cast(p.state as string) like ? and p.account like ? and cast(p.role.role_code as string) = ?
